name: Age Of Army Wars
description:
Predict the enemy's move and produce soldiers from him in barracks.

You can produce soldiers as you want in close combat or away combat.

The more you love, the stronger your opponent will be.

Form your strategies, choose between vehicles, soldiers and place them wisely on the battlefield and beat every opponent !
In Age Of Army Wars be the winner of the most exciting battles.

Spend your budget neatly and become the winner of this war. Destroy your rival's base as soon as possible.



Take control of 16different units and different special feature to defend your base and destroy your enemy.

Battle your way through the ages in this insanely addicting action/strategy game.
